name: Channel Selection Process
description: Process for evaluating, analyzing, and implementing campaign briefs for channel selection

elements.name: Process Initiated
elements.description: Starting point when a client brief is received

elements.name: Send briefing template to client
elements.description: Initiate the process by sending the briefing template to the client

elements.name: Brief Classification
elements.description: Classify brief as Optimise / Innovate / Transform based on complexity, ambition and budget

elements.name: Planning Process
elements.description: Set out SLA, format for response and Gantt chart for response timeline detailing key milestones and R&R

elements.name: Arrange Kickoff Meeting
elements.description: Arrange a kick off meeting with key team members (inc Specialists) to discuss brief, Gantt chart & R&R for response

elements.name: Collate Initial Questions
elements.description: Collate initial questions from the key team to address any gaps or ambiguities in the brief and seek clarification from clients

elements.name: Share Answers
elements.description: Share answers to initial questions from client with key team

elements.name: Past Performance Analysis
elements.description: Investigate any relevant past performance using Apollo / PCAs / client documentation and summarise key points

elements.name: Competitor Analysis
elements.description: Investigate any relevant competitor campaigns using Nielsen AdIntel / SimilarWeb and summarise key points

elements.name: Category Trends Analysis
elements.description: Investigate any relevant category trends using Mintel / WARC / Google and summarise key points

elements.name: Brand Health Analysis
elements.description: Investigate any relevant brand health trends using YouGov / client documentation and summarise key points

elements.name: Audience Profile Development
elements.description: Develop a profile of the target audience(s) using YouGov Profiles and develop pen portrait and summary of lifestyle and media consumption

elements.name: Audience Trends Analysis
elements.description: Investigate any relevant audience trends using Mintel / WARC / Google and summarise key points

elements.name: Channel Summarization
elements.description: Summarise candidate channels based on Strategy using Touchpoints / BARB to create an indicative channel plan

elements.name: Brief Specialists
elements.description: Brief Specialists (inc Mediabridge/Whistl/Radioworks) on summary of previous stages to build out detailed channel plans and supporting rationale slides

elements.name: Create Channel Scorecard
elements.description: Assess recommendations from Specialists strategic framework and create a channel scorecard slide using Touchpoints / BARB / Platform Data

elements.name: Develop Testing Roadmap
elements.description: Develop testing roadmap from strategic framework inc hypotheses, channel, KPI(s), phasing and measurement

elements.name: Brief Media Owners
elements.description: Assess recommendations from Specialists and agree R&R for any further details needed from media owners to complete plans and rationale

elements.name: Present Response
elements.description: Present response to brief and full media recommendation (PowerPoint) to client

elements.name: Populate Media Plan
elements.description: Populate detailed media plan, incorporating any feedback from the client to the response to brief

elements.name: Request Specifications
elements.description: Request specs needed for full asset/placement list inc supply deadline for campaign

elements.name: Collate Specifications
elements.description: Collate specs needed for full asset/placement list inc supply deadlines for campaign and share with client and/or creative agency to ensure it is achievable

elements.name: Share Media Plan
elements.description: Share detailed media plan with client for written approval and PO (if a PO client)

elements.name: Confirm Approval
elements.description: Confirm plan approval and receipt of PO to wider team inc Specialists and Mediabridge/Whistl/Radioworks to move towards activation

elements.name: Process Complete
elements.description: Channel selection process is complete and ready for activation

elements.name: Strategic Framework Development
elements.description: Develop strategic framework that builds on Diagnosis & Audience Insight phases, addresses the objectives in the brief

elements.name: Media Role Agreement
elements.description: Agree the role/s for media based on strategic framework

elements.name: Consult Apollo on Testing
elements.description: Consult Apollo on testing roadmap to ensure it is achievable, and any associated costs/implications

elements.name: Develop Evaluation Framework
elements.description: Develop evaluation framework for assessing performance of campaign, inc projections/forecasts from Apollo (where modelling is available)

elements.name: Save PO to Sharepoint
elements.description: Save PO to Sharepoint and add details to PO tracker once received (if a PO client)

phases.name: Initiation
phases.description: Initial steps to set up the channel selection process

phases.name: Diagnosis
phases.description: Analyze past performance, competitors, category trends, and brand health

phases.name: Audience & Insight
phases.description: Develop audience profiles and investigate audience trends

phases.name: Strategy
phases.description: Develop strategic framework and agree on media roles

phases.name: Execution
phases.description: Develop channel plans, scorecard, testing roadmap, and brief media owners

phases.name: Evaluation
phases.description: Develop evaluation framework for assessing performance

phases.name: Finalization
phases.description: Finalization of the channel selection process
